pages.text: $(item)Batteries$() $(major)store Zaps$(). Higher tier Batteries store more Zaps.$(br2)$(o)Technically$(), Batteries do not have Voltages. You can use an EV Battery on an LV machine without trouble.$(br2)You can fill Batteries in Generators or Battery Boxes, and drain them in all non-generator machines.
The $(item)Single-Use Battery$() is full when crafted, and vanishes when drained.
